I am offering The E90-2 Honus Wagner in a psa 2.5 for sale.  Take a look at the image, its a very nice looking card.  Light scrape in the border on lower right hand corner technically lowers the grade of this beauty.

Price $4,995

I can be reached at [url]gfg@gfg.com[/url] if you are interested or have any questions.

David Levin
[IMG]https://gfg.com/baseball/e90wagnerpsa2.5.jpg[/IMG]
You may have better luck in the b/s/t section that includes E cards (you posted on the T card section).  Good luck!

Thanks, not sure what I was thinking

Dave
